alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Craven; Jones; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 5:02PM EDT until May 09 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jones County in eastern North Carolina... Central Craven County in eastern North Carolina... South central Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... Pamlico County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 502 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Askins, or 11 miles north of New Bern, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 4:25 PM, 1" hail was reported in Ayden, NC. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Bern, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Florence, Olympia, Janeiro, Grantsboro, Whortonsville, Riverdale, Maribel, Nc Pamlico, Merritt, Fairfield Harbour, Minnesott Beach Ferry, Coastal Carolina Regional Airport, Bayboro, Alliance, Arapahoe and Bridgeton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
